subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea kept up its perfect record in the Premier League as two goals from Michael Essien steered the English champion to a 3-1 victory at West Ham and its fourth win in as many matches this season.
snippet: Chelsea kept up its perfect record in the Premier League as two goals from Michael Essien steered the English champion to a 3-1 victory at West Ham and its fourth win in as many matches this season.
